price: 18. Mayee, hubaal, diiwaanka (camalka) dadka wanaagsan wuxuu yaal Cilliyyiin (samada toddobaad).
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-abrāri lafī ʿilliyyīna
